Articles.Content:
Simple game, not sure if people will like it, but wanted to try it.

The point is simply to think of conditions of a real life situation which, if in a video game, would be characteristic of a  "hard mode".

Examples:

doing a math exam without a calculator

flying a plane with no experience beforehand

breaking out of a maximum security prison

 

Sound fun?

Great! (dont know if you said yes or no)

let's begin

FIRST!!1!

Okay, back on topic:

Riding a horse without a saddle.

Skiing on molten snow

Shearing a sheep with with normal shears

Walking in an EVA suit on earth!
